attributes.action: remove this petition from the website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is a waste of time for all concerned. It goes against the important function of petitions and demeans both the people who sign it and the system that allowed it.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
